path.style: paint-order: stroke; stroke-linejoin: round; fill: rgba(159, 111, 111, 0); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 2.3px; transform-origin: 15.899px 15.933px;

stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 2.3px; transform-origin: 15.898px 15.933px;
